Question
========
Which risk is highlighted when sharing data with AI tools?

Answerlist
----------
* Data is always deleted immediately.
* Data may be stored on company servers and used for training.
* Data becomes public automatically.
* Data cannot be processed by AI tools.

Solution
========
The unit warns that data can be retained by providers for model improvement.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
